com.github.brunothg.game.engine.control

Class RememberGameKeyAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.event.KeyAdapter
      • com.github.brunothg.game.engine.control.RememberGameKeyAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    KeyListener, EventListener

    public class RememberGameKeyAdapter
extends KeyAdapter
    KeyAdapter that tracks detailed information about key events.
    Author:
    Marvin Bruns
